intro.title: Intro
intro.description: Hey there! I’m Michael — a software developer and a student of Multiplatform Software Development. Before getting into tech, I spent 5 years working in the aviation industry, where I built a strong foundation in critical thinking, teamwork, and problem-solving. I officially started my journey in software in 2023, and since then, I’ve been focused on building web solutions that are fast, scalable, and add real value to businesses. I’m always learning, always improving, and always looking for better ways to solve problems through code.

achievements.1: Built a scheduling system for the aerospace division that was ranked among the top 10 intern projects across the company.
achievements.2: Created ETL and data analysis tools that helped improve resource planning and decision-making.
achievements.3: Led modernization efforts on internal systems to improve backend performance and user experience.

achievements.1: Migrated a legacy .NET system to Next.js, cutting file generation time from 2 minutes to just 1 second.
achievements.2: Built a real-time data processing server using Node.js, RabbitMQ, and PostgreSQL for IoT devices.
achievements.3: Developed a modern dashboard in React/Next.js to visualize and analyze IoT data.

fatec.description: I'm currently studying Multiplatform Software Development at FATEC Jacareí and expect to graduate in December 2025.
